Package bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.metrics

Interface MetricListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeadsUpDisplay
    public interface MetricListener
    A MetricListener is interested in receives updates from a MetricController through the corresponding MetricUpdater.
    Author:
    ENG1 Team 23 (Cohort 3)
    See Also:
    MetricController, MetricUpdater

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void updateMetricText​(MetricController.Metric metric, java.lang.String text)
      Informs the implementor that the text associated with the given MetricController.Metric should be updated

    • Method Detail

      • updateMetricText

        void updateMetricText​(MetricController.Metric metric,
                      java.lang.String text)
        Informs the implementor that the text associated with the given MetricController.Metric should be updated
        Parameters:
        metric - The key of the MetricController.Metric to be updated
        text - The revised text
